name: PALLAVI SHENGARPWAR
college: Dr. D Y Patil Institute of Technology

education.school: Dr. D Y Patil Institute of Technology

projects.name: Project 5 Marketing Analytics Bio-Pharmaceutical Client
projects.description: Utilizing analytics to derive actionable insights from marketing campaigns, focusing on optimizing ROI and identifying key drivers of customer engagement. Working closely with cross-functional teams to align marketing strategies with business objectives, ensuring cohesive and impactful campaign execution.

projects.name: Project 4 Media Analytics for a Multi-National Pharmaceutical Client
projects.description: Account Setup: Set up the account from scratch and collaborated with stakeholders on business decisions. Led the processes of data collection, monthly and quarterly reporting, and KPI analysis, ensuring comprehensive and accurate data management. Engaged with clients to discuss and understand their business questions, ensuring that KPI analysis was aligned with their strategic goals. Took the lead in creating client-focused media performance dashboards for over 70 different brands, enhancing the decision-making process. Played a pivotal role in communicating media effectiveness on conversions, which led to a significant 20% increase in conversions.

projects.name: Project 3 Reporting and Cost Analysis for a Pharmaceutical Client
projects.description: Analyzed the impact of marketing channels on conversions relative to media spend, identifying which channels provided the best return on investment. Offered targeted optimization suggestions to improve the effectiveness of different marketing channels. Developed a comprehensive, client-focused Tableau dashboard to understand media effectiveness through cost analysis, enabling the client to make data-driven decisions. Created a robust data check process to ensure accuracy and reliability in cost analysis, streamlining data validation and anomaly detection.

projects.name: Project 2 Dashboarding and Multi Touch Attribution for a Pharmaceutical Client
projects.description: Analyzed customer touchpoints to assess the impact of marketing channels on conversions. Wrote SQL queries to streamline the data check process, identifying anomalies and discrepancies. Managed dashboards to check on data quality and analyze customer touchpoints. Played an important role in maintaining data accuracy through rigorous QA processes.

projects.name: Project 1 Migration of Reports from UA to GA4 for a Toy Store Client
projects.description: Collaborated closely with a senior team member to educate the client on the differences between Universal Analytics and GA4, ensuring they understood the new system and its capabilities. Engaged in generating visualizations and reports to effectively communicate the delta in values and insights to stakeholders, making the data transition smooth and transparent. Implemented robust data validation techniques to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the migrated data, minimizing discrepancies and ensuring a seamless transition. Facilitated regular meetings and presentations with stakeholders to discuss progress, address concerns, and provide training on GA4 functionalities and best practices.

full_output.name: PALLAVI SHENGARPWAR
achievements_and_awards: Recognized and awarded by clients and the India team for handling and streamlining brand-specific dashboards for the client.
Showcased Looker studio to wider India team across different projects as a case study.
